alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued April 24 at 5:34AM CDT until April 26 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...In Alabama, Baldwin Coastal and Mobile Coastal Counties. In Florida, Santa Rosa Coastal, Okaloosa Coastal and Escambia Coastal Counties. * WHEN...Through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breaking waves of 3 to 5 feet expected today for the surf zone across coastal Alabama and northwest Florida.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
